fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Budget, Trade, Consumers, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Research and innovation, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
EPEE follows EU laws and initiatives related to F-gas, energy efficiency, Ecodesign, climate change, and market surveillance, among others. We also regularly organise events in Brussels, Europe, and further afield.  
 
More details of our activities in Brussels, the EU Member States, and globally, can be found on our website (www.epeeglobal.org).
organisation_name: European Partnership for Energy and the Environment (EPEE)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations

goals__remit: The European Partnership for Energy and the Environment (EPEE) represents the refrigeration, air-conditioning and heat pump industry in Europe. Founded in the year 2000, EPEE’s membership is composed of 40 member companies and national associations across Europe realising a turnover of over 30 billion Euros and employing more than 200,000 people in Europe.  As an expert association, EPEE is supporting safe, environmentally and economically viable technologies with the objective of promoting a better understanding of the sector in the EU and contributing to the development of effective European policies. For more information please visit: www.epeeglobal.org
